basic.description: This course is an in-depth exploration and practice of techniques and methods of construction and execution of solutions to advanced problems in costuming and make-up technology. May be repeated once with new content to a maximum of six semester hours.
basic.subject: TPA
basic.title: Selected Topics in Stage Costuming and Make-Up Technology

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: THE 4260, TPA 3230C, and TPA 3248, or instructor permission.
